title: SB72 – Administrative Office of the Courts Appropriation for the 2025-2026 Fiscal Year
description: Engrossed version of Senate Bill 72 (Act 776) appropriating funds for the Administrative Office of the Courts for the 2025‑2026 fiscal year.  The bill includes appropriations for the Accountability Court Fund ($400,000), Adult Drug Court Program ($1,000,000), specialty courts ($4,500,000) and other programs【820752699809212†L1290-L1466】.
